sn12.32:1.2: Atha kho kalarakhattiyo bhikkhu yenayasma sariputto tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmata sariputtena saddhim sammodi.
sn12.32:1.3: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho kalarakhattiyo bhikkhu ayasmantam sariputtam etadavoca:
sn12.32:1.4: “moliyaphagguno, avuso sariputta, bhikkhu sikkham paccakkhaya hinayavatto”ti.
sn12.32:1.5: “Na hi nuna so ayasma imasmim dhammavinaye assasamalattha”ti.
sn12.32:2.1: “Tena hayasma sariputto imasmim dhammavinaye assasam patto”ti?
sn12.32:5.1: Atha kho kalarakhattiyo bhikkhu utthayasana yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho kalarakhattiyo bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn12.32:5.3: ‘khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanami”ti.
sn12.32:6.1: Atha kho bhagava annataram bhikkhum amantesi:
sn12.32:6.2: “ehi tvam, bhikkhu, mama vacanena sariputtam amantehi:
sn12.32:6.4: “Evam, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato patissutva yenayasma sariputto tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam sariputtam etadavoca:
sn12.32:6.6: “Evam, avuso”ti kho ayasma sariputto tassa bhikkhuno patissutva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho ayasmantam sariputtam bhagava etadavoca:
sn12.32:6.8: ‘khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanami”ti?
sn12.32:6.9: “Na kho, bhante, etehi padehi etehi byanjanehi attho vutto”ti.
sn12.32:6.10: “Yena kenacipi, sariputta, pariyayena kulaputto annam byakaroti, atha kho byakatam byakatato datthabban”ti.
sn12.32:6.12: ‘na kho, bhante, etehi padehi etehi byanjanehi attho vutto’”ti.
sn12.32:7.2: ‘katham janata pana taya, avuso sariputta, katham passata anna byakata—
sn12.32:7.3: khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattayati pajanami’ti.
sn12.32:7.4: Evam puttho tvam, sariputta, kinti byakareyyasi”ti?
sn12.32:8.2: ‘katham janata pana taya, avuso sariputta, katham passata anna byakata—
sn12.32:8.3: khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattayati pajanami’ti;
sn12.32:8.5: ‘yamnidana, avuso, jati, tassa nidanassa khaya khinasmim khinamhiti viditam.
sn12.32:8.7: khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattayati pajanami’ti.
sn12.32:9.2: ‘jati panavuso sariputta, kimnidana kimsamudaya kimjatika kimpabhava’ti?
sn12.32:9.3: Evam puttho tam, sariputta, kinti byakareyyasi”ti?
sn12.32:9.5: ‘jati panavuso sariputta, kimnidana kimsamudaya kimjatika kimpabhava’ti?
sn12.32:9.7: ‘jati kho, avuso, bhavanidana bhavasamudaya bhavajatika bhavappabhava’ti.
sn12.32:10.2: ‘bhavo panavuso sariputta, kimnidano kimsamudayo kimjatiko kimpabhavo’ti?
sn12.32:10.3: Evam puttho tvam, sariputta, kinti byakareyyasi”ti?
sn12.32:10.5: ‘bhavo panavuso sariputta, kimnidano kimsamudayo kimjatiko kimpabhavo’ti?
sn12.32:10.7: ‘bhavo kho, avuso, upadananidano upadanasamudayo upadanajatiko upadanappabhavo’ti.
sn12.32:11.3: sace pana tam, sariputta, evam puccheyyum—
sn12.32:11.4: tanha panavuso sariputta, kimnidana kimsamudaya kimjatika kimpabhava’ti?
sn12.32:11.5: Evam puttho tvam, sariputta, kinti byakareyyasi”ti?
sn12.32:11.7: ‘tanha panavuso sariputta, kimnidana kimsamudaya kimjatika kimpabhava’ti?
sn12.32:11.9: ‘tanha kho, avuso, vedananidana vedanasamudaya vedanajatika vedanapabhava’ti.
sn12.32:12.2: ‘katham janato pana te, avuso sariputta, katham passato ya vedanasu nandi sa na upatthasi’ti.
sn12.32:12.3: Evam puttho tvam, sariputta, kinti byakareyyasi”ti?
sn12.32:12.5: ‘katham janato pana te, avuso sariputta, katham passato ya vedanasu nandi sa na upatthasi’ti evam putthoham, bhante, evam byakareyyam:
sn12.32:12.8: Sukha vedana, dukkha vedana, adukkhamasukha vedana.
sn12.32:12.9: Ima kho, avuso, tisso vedana anicca.
sn12.32:12.11: viditam, ya vedanasu nandi sa na upatthasi’ti.
sn12.32:13.2: Ayampi kho, sariputta, pariyayo, etasseva atthassa sankhittena veyyakaranaya:
sn12.32:14.2: ‘katham vimokkha pana taya, avuso sariputta, anna byakata—
sn12.32:14.3: khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattayati pajanami’ti?
sn12.32:14.4: Evam puttho tvam, sariputta, kinti byakareyyasi”ti?
sn12.32:14.6: ‘katham vimokkha pana taya, avuso sariputta, anna byakata—
sn12.32:14.7: khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattayati pajanami’ti.
sn12.32:14.9: ‘ajjhattam vimokkha khvaham, avuso, sabbupadanakkhaya tatha sato viharami yatha satam viharantam asava nanussavanti, attananca navajanami’ti.
sn12.32:15.2: Ayampi kho sariputta, pariyayo etasseva atthassa sankhittena veyyakaranaya—
sn12.32:15.3: ye asava samanena vutta tesvaham na kankhami, te me pahinati na vicikicchami”ti.
sn12.32:15.5: Idam vatva sugato utthayasana viharam pavisi.
sn12.32:16.1: Tatra kho ayasma sariputto acirapakkantassa bhagavato bhikkhu amantesi:
sn12.32:16.2: “pubbe appatisamviditam mam, avuso, bhagava pathamam panham apucchi, tassa me ahosi dandhayitattam.
sn12.32:16.3: Yato ca kho me, avuso, bhagava pathamam panham anumodi, tassa mayham, avuso, etadahosi—
sn12.32:16.4: divasancepi mam bhagava etamattham puccheyya annamannehi padehi annamannehi pariyayehi, divasampaham bhagavato etamattham byakareyyam annamannehi padehi annamannehi pariyayehi.
sn12.32:16.5: Rattincepi mam bhagava etamattham puccheyya annamannehi padehi annamannehi pariyayehi, rattimpaham bhagavato etamattham byakareyyam annamannehi padehi annamannehi pariyayehi.
sn12.32:16.6: Rattindivam cepi mam bhagava etamattham puccheyya annamannehi padehi annamannehi pariyayehi, rattindivampaham bhagavato etamattham byakareyyam annamannehi padehi annamannehi pariyayehi.
sn12.32:16.7: Dve rattindivani cepi mam bhagava etamattham puccheyya …pe…
sn12.32:16.9: tini rattindivani cepi mam bhagava etamattham puccheyya …pe…
sn12.32:16.11: cattari rattindivani cepi mam bhagava etamattham puccheyya …pe…
sn12.32:16.13: panca rattindivani cepi mam bhagava etamattham puccheyya …pe…
sn12.32:16.15: cha rattindivani cepi mam bhagava etamattham puccheyya …pe…
sn12.32:16.17: satta rattindivani cepi mam bhagava etamattham puccheyya annamannehi padehi annamannehi pariyayehi, satta rattindivanipaham bhagavato etamattham byakareyyam annamannehi padehi annamannehi pariyayehi”ti.
sn12.32:17.1: Atha kho kalarakhattiyo bhikkhu utthayasana yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho kalarakhattiyo bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn12.32:17.3: pubbe appatisamviditam mam, avuso, bhagava pathamam panham apucchi, tassa me ahosi dandhayitattam.
sn12.32:17.4: Yato ca kho me, avuso, bhagava pathamam panham anumodi, tassa mayham, avuso, etadahosi—
sn12.32:17.5: divasancepi mam bhagava etamattham puccheyya annamannehi padehi annamannehi pariyayehi, divasampaham bhagavato etamattham byakareyyam annamannehi padehi annamannehi pariyayehi;
sn12.32:17.13: satta rattindivani cepi mam bhagava etamattham puccheyya annamannehi padehi annamannehi pariyayehi, satta rattindivanipaham bhagavato etamattham byakareyyam annamannehi padehi annamannehi pariyayehi”ti.
sn12.32:18.1: “Sa hi, bhikkhu, sariputtassa dhammadhatu suppatividdha, yassa dhammadhatuya suppatividdhatta divasam cepaham sariputtam etamattham puccheyyam annamannehi padehi annamannehi pariyayehi, divasampi me sariputto etamattham byakareyya annamannehi padehi annamannehi pariyayehi.
sn12.32:18.2: Rattim cepaham sariputtam etamattham puccheyyam annamannehi padehi annamannehi pariyayehi, rattimpi me sariputto etamattham byakareyya …pe…
sn12.32:18.3: rattindivam cepaham sariputtam etamattham puccheyyam, rattindivampi me sariputto etamattham byakareyya …
sn12.32:18.4: dve rattindivani cepaham sariputtam etamattham puccheyyam, dve rattindivanipi me sariputto etamattham byakareyya …
sn12.32:18.5: tini rattindivani cepaham sariputtam etamattham puccheyyam, tini rattindivanipi me sariputto etamattham byakareyya …
sn12.32:18.6: cattari rattindivani cepaham sariputtam etamattham puccheyyam, cattari rattindivanipi me sariputto etamattham byakareyya …
sn12.32:18.7: panca rattindivani cepaham sariputtam etamattham puccheyyam, panca rattindivanipi me sariputto etamattham byakareyya …
sn12.32:18.8: cha rattindivani cepaham sariputtam etamattham puccheyyam, cha rattindivanipi me sariputto etamattham byakareyya …
sn12.32:18.9: satta rattindivani cepaham sariputtam etamattham puccheyyam annamannehi padehi annamannehi pariyayehi, satta rattindivanipi me sariputto etamattham byakareyya annamannehi padehi annamannehi pariyayehi”ti.
